explains: v. （使）延误，（使）延期；使耽搁，使迟到；（故意）拖延（delay 的过去式和过去分词）
wordGroup: delayed hypersensitivity 迟发过敏性；延迟（型）超敏反应
delayed delivery 延期交货；迟延分娩

sentences.en: The lift-off was delayed about seven minutes.
sentences.cn: 发射时间推迟了7分钟左右。

sentences.en: The return flight of the aircraft was delayed.
sentences.cn: 飞机的返回航程被推迟了。
